attributes.action: Ban online animal sales or free to good homes sites
attributes.additional_details: all the evidence and vile pictures on on the following site if you wish to read http://www.animal-rights-action.com/free-to-good-home
attributes.background: for sites to encourage and educate people who want to sell animals or to give away their animals to speak to professionals first ( ie rescues) as it has been proven that most animals are being used as bait and abuse and this cruelty has to be stopped, these animals have been through enough

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about animals being sold online, but we're not sure exactly what actions you're asking for. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
